ServerTablut

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • ServerTablut.Game

  • public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents the pure game, with all the rules; it check the move, the state of the match and is a pawn is eliminated or not
    Author:
    A.Piretti

      Game(Logger l, int moves)

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      State checkMove(State state, Action a)
      This method checks an action in a state: if it is correct the state is going to be changed, if it is wrong it throws a specific exception

    • Method Detail

      • checkMove

        public State checkMove(State state,
                       Action a)
                throws BoardException,
                       ActionException,
                       StopException,
                       PawnException,
                       DiagonalException,
                       ClimbingException,
                       ThroneException
        This method checks an action in a state: if it is correct the state is going to be changed, if it is wrong it throws a specific exception
        Parameters:
        state - the state of the game
        a - the action to be analyzed
        Returns:
        the new state of the game
        Throws:
        BoardException - try to move a pawn out of the board
        ActionException - the format of the action is wrong
        StopException - try to not move any pawn
        PawnException - try to move an enemy pawn
        DiagonalException - try to move a pawn diagonally
        ClimbingException - try to climb over another pawn
        ThroneException - try to move a pawn into the throne boxe
